function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through proximity detection using Bluetooth LE for contact tracing.","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases leading to increased infections and potential outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implement secure and privacy-focused data exchange protocols, limit data disclosure, and ensure accurate detection of infected individuals.","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving Bluetooth LE protocols, secure data encryption, and accurate proximity detection algorithms.","People":"General public, individuals using contact tracing apps, healthcare workers and frontline staff.","Owner":"App developers, public health authorities, and healthcare organizations."},{"Description":"Privacy concerns in mHealth sensing applications due to data collection via Bluetooth technology.","Impact":"Unauthorized access to sensitive medical data, privacy breaches, and potential misuse of personal health information.","Mitigation":"Implement robust data encryption, authentication mechanisms, and user consent controls to ensure data privacy and security.","Technologies":"Strong data encryption, user authentication, and permission-based data access controls.","People":"Individuals using mHealth sensing apps, patients, healthcare providers, and data security professionals.","Owner":"App developers, healthcare organizations, and regulatory authorities."},{"Description":"Risk of unauthorized data disclosure in discoverable mode of Bluetooth devices.","Impact":"Disclosure of personal information, including name and address, leading to privacy breaches and potential exploitation of sensitive data.","Mitigation":"Enable non-discoverable mode by default, limit the information disclosed during device discovery, and ensure user consent for data exchange.","Technologies":"Non-discoverable Bluetooth device settings, limited data disclosure configurations, and user-controlled privacy settings.","People":"Individuals using Bluetooth devices, mobile device users, and individuals in proximity to Bluetooth-enabled devices.","Owner":"Device manufacturers, app developers, and privacy advocates."},{"Description":"Historical development of Wi-Fi technology leading to current widespread adoption and usage.","Impact":"Increased reliance on Wi-Fi for communication and data exchange, leading to potential security vulnerabilities and privacy risks.","Mitigation":"Regular security updates, strong authentication protocols, and encryption standards to protect data transmitted over Wi-Fi networks.","Technologies":"Secure Wi-Fi protocols, encrypted data transmission, and strong authentication mechanisms.","People":"Users of Wi-Fi networks, individuals transmitting data over Wi-Fi, and organizations relying on Wi-Fi connectivity.","Owner":"Wi-Fi technology providers, network administrators, and cybersecurity professionals."}]}
